ink:
life without you
is a parallel universe
everything is the same
but everything is different
i am in my house
but i am not home
you are the universe poured into a human body

if The Love Stories could remember
the beauty of their Beginnings,
They would certainly not travel on
the path which have an Ending

A little of you, A little of me,
made us totally complete

Never let the flame of your hope
burn down the pages of reality

I'm comfortable with illusions.
Reality just drags my soul away from me

If you can love
the hurricane
in my eyes
then you deserve
the universe
in my heart

there's no fixing my broken pieces.
i just hope my cracks
create a masterpiece

my body is a temple
my heart a religion
don't come in without believeing
People with the heart of gold never rusts
